name: Snowpainters
description:
Snowpainters was made by graduate students at SMU Guildhall as part of their Team Game Project course. The game was designed and produced by a diverse group representing a variety of cultures, nationalities, genders, and sexual identities.

Features

· Multiplayer: Race with up to four friends in split-screen mode locally or by Steam's Remote Play Together
· Mechanics: Paint boosting, color swapping, power sliding, sick flips!
· Paint Boosting: Gather up paint cans to fill your boost meter.
· Color Swapping: Change your penguin’s color to match the different paint trails on the track to go even faster!
· Customization: Choose between three distinct penguins and customize them with a variety of hats.
